### [Explosive Devices Training Services](#explosive-devices-training-services)

Government of Canada (GC) Tender Announcement:

#### Notice Details

*   Title: Explosive Devices Training Services
*   Reference Number: PW-KIN-956-8721
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: W6399-23DB10/A
*   Publication Date: 12/19/2022
*   Tender Closing Date: 01/13/2023
*   Amendment Date: 12/22/2022
*   Current Status: Expired

#### Procurement Details

*   **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No
*   **Cost Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)

#### Service Description

Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to procure goods and training services related to Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD ) and Improvised Explosive Devices (IEDs) from qualified suppliers. The term of the Supply Agreement is from PW-KIN-956-8721, and submissions should be made electronically using epost Connect.

#### Evaluation Criteria

 Suppliers must meet all mandatory technical criteria (MTC) as specified in Annex B. For a full and detailed description of evaluation criteria, refer to annex A Background.

#### Contacts Information

*   **Contact Name:** Malko-Moore, Shamael
    *   **Title:**
    *   **Email:** [shamael.malko-moore@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   **Phone:** (343) 422-7228
    *   **Fax:** (613) 545-8067
    *   **Address**
